name: Heavy Hand Crossing
blurb: A brining town, large inland tanks of brine are the only thing of note
places: Monastery of the Cask: A coalition of monks that tend to and meditate inside of the large brining tanks.
people: Willis Malone: A stingy dwarven tanner, who owns the biggest leather and hide operation in the Northern Frontier. If you are to strike a deal, make sure its in writing!
